original_title: の横浜ドリームシンデレラ2021
overview: Yokohama Dream Cinderella 2021 in Summer is the first Stardom PPV since the 5.5-star match between Utami Hayashishita and Syuri that has seen the company gain widespread acclaim and more attention from non-Joshi fans than it’s had since the Threedom days.  This show has big shoes to fill as Tokyo Dream Cinderella made a major mark with its main event but the overall card promises to be much stronger on this show.  With four championships on the line, this show promises to be eventful so let’s get into it.
title: Stardom Yokohama Dream Cinderella 2021 in Summer
